doc.title: Clarkesworld Magazine - Science Fiction & Fantasy
doc.author: JC Jongwon Park
doc.excerpt: Clarkesworld Science Fiction and Fantasy Magazine and Podcast. This page: Talk by JC Jongwon Park

main.head: Talk
main.p: JC Jongwon Park is an illustrator and concept artist based in Hamburg, Germany where he currently works in the video game, feature film, animation, TV commercial, and publishing industries. JC has created concept art for games such as Gears of War, Chorus, Everspace, Aion, and Legend of the Cryptids.
